nav.div: Lapeer Community Schools » Administration » Special Education & Student Services » Special Education Closure Resources

br.br:
Parents of Special Education students --
Please read the following letter from Jennifer Tindall, Director of Special Education Services for Lapeer Community Schools. Once you have read the letter, please take advantage of the online resources below throughout the remainder of the school district closure.
• April 15, 2020: MDE Family Matters on Extended Time Away for Parents
• April 8, 2020: Letter to Special Education Parents

strong.span: • Parent letter from Jennifer Tindall, Director of Special Education
Online Resources for Special Education Students

a.title: Video Learning Squad: Social Skills Squad

strong.a: Video Learning Squad: Social Skills Squad

p.span: Monday’s at 10am students/families can go to
“The Nerdy School Social Worker” on Facebook for a free live social emotional lesson.

a.title: Some social skill and emotion activities

span.a: Some social skill and emotion activities

a.title: A 30-day calendar of social emotional activities for kids

span.a: A 30-day calendar of social emotional activities for kids

p.span: Digital Timer: (Good for keeping a routine or setting limits for time on tasks.)
Social-Emotional Videos/Read-a louds/activities & Lessons for Early Childhood/Lower EL (can search by age and topics)

span.br: Enter Code: SCHOOL7771 to set up a free family account (lower el/early childhood)

p.span: Enter Code: SCHOOL7771 to set up a free account (preschool through 6th grade)
Enter Code: SCHOOL 7771 for a free account (3rd-8th grade)
